data_table.description: Fasting/Tracking Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: FTRD4A
variable.description: Day last consumed. Q4a [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: FTRD6
variable.description: Blood given in Last 7 Days? Q6 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: FTRDFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: FTRD5
variable.description: Computed fasting time. Q5 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: FTRD3AHM
variable.description: Time of fasting determination [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: FTRD4BHM
variable.description: Time last consumed anything besides water [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 4]
